caption: Relating to a prohibition on marketing, advertising, or selling certain e-cigarette products; creating a criminal offense.
last_action: 05/12/2025 H Scheduled for public hearing on . . .
summary: This bill prohibits marketing, advertising, and selling e-cigarette products manufactured in China. Chinese manufacturers and distributors of e-cigarettes will be directly impacted as their products will be banned from the Texas market. The bill also bans e-cigarette products with certain designs targeting minors or disguised as everyday items, regardless of nicotine content.
translation: 该法案禁止销售、营销和广告推广在中国制造的电子烟产品。中国电子烟制造商和经销商将受到直接影响，因为他们的产品将被禁止在德克萨斯州市场销售。该法案还禁止针对未成年人的特定设计或伪装成日常用品的电子烟产品，不论其是否含有尼古丁。
